message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $15000 to me, but I understand its value might be different for you. I'm willing to consider offers between $12000 and $15000. Let's find a fair price that works for both of us. Looking forward to your response!

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
